LTC2984¶

class ltc2984.ltc2984(spi_ob, cs, interrupt)¶
__init__(spi_ob, cs, interrupt) → None¶

__init__ initalizes the ltc2984 object

Parameters

  • spi_ob (busio.SPI) – spi object

  • cs (digitalio.DigitalInOut) – digital pin for CS

  • interrupt (digitalio.DigitalInOut) – digital pin for interrupt

chan_assignment(channel, data) → None¶

chan_assignment assigns channel

Parameters

  • channel (int) – Channel number from 1-20

  • data (long) – 32 bit data

chan_conv(channel) → None¶

chan_conv requests a channel conversion

Parameters

channel (int) – channel to be converted

check_conv()¶

check_conv Checks if conversion is complete

check_interrupt() → bool¶

check_interrupt Checks if interrupt high or low

Returns

True if interrupt not busy, False if interrupt busy

Return type

bool

convert_and_read(channel) → float¶

convert_and_read Performs a channel conversion and reads the data

Parameters

channel (int (0-20)) – Channel to be checked

Returns

Data from requested ram location

Return type

float

read_data(channel) → float¶

read_data Reads data from the requested ram location

Parameters

channel (int (0-20)) – Channel to be checked

Returns

Data from requested ram location

Return type

float
